effect.x_y: Deals regular damage. Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Deals regular damage. Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.

short_effect.x_y: Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text.x_y: The user absorbs its target’s HP. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user absorbs its target’s HP. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.
